body:
For more general enquiries or to ask us a question about your claim, [contact the CICA](https://www.justice.gov.uk/complaints/cica/complaint-form).

## Before you start

You will need to provide some personal information such as date of birth and address. This is so we can verify your identity before discussing the details of any claim you may have with us. You can read more about how we protect this information in our [privacy notice](https://www.gov.uk/guidance/cica-privacy-notice). 

If you prefer not to provide this information, you can call to make your complaint:

* Telephone: 0300 003 3601
* From outside the UK: +44 20 3684 2517
heading: Complain to the CICA
lede: Use this form to complain about an aspect of the CICA or how we have handled your claim.
